heroSubtext: Proven GTM Operations leader bridging strategy and execution across global markets, with expertise in acquisition optimization, cross-functional alignment, and scalable process design.

keyWins.description: SQO improvement via Pipeline Generation Council at Camunda
Efficiency increase through automated reporting at Pinterest/Accenture
Clients served with 150+ five-star reviews at Wags For Us
Operations alignment across AMER/APAC and EMEA at Camunda

experience.title: GTM Strategy & Operations Manager AMER/APAC
highlights: Primary North America point of contact aligning operational initiatives across VP of Sales, CRO, and EMEA counterparts
Led Pipeline Generation Council improving SQOs by 181% YoY
Implemented Clari dashboards for AE forecasting, global revenue calls, and QBRs
Co-owned Rules of Engagement rollout streamlining GTM processes
Managed regional and global incentive programs translating performance data into leadership insights

experience.title: Sales Strategy & Operations
highlights: Translated large datasets into actionable insights informing VP-level and CFO/CEO decisions
Supported capacity planning, forecasting, and rhythm-of-business in high-growth ad sales
Built automated reporting systems increasing efficiency by 30%
Conducted market analysis and sales process optimization influencing strategic initiatives

experience.title: Co-Founder & Operations Lead
highlights: Co-founded and managed operations, CRM architecture (Odoo), and revenue strategy
Served 350+ clients with 150+ five-star reviews maintaining repeatable acquisition funnels
Leveraged third-party platforms (Rover) for consistent new business growth
Built scalable operational workflows and cross-functional coordination processes

experience.title: Licensed Realtor®
highlights: Passed licensing exam on first attempt with high marks after world-class training
Implemented Odoo CRM for proprietary sales methodology (Ninja Selling)
Built pipeline independently through inbound and outbound lead generation
Translate market data into actionable client insights and forecast analysis

projects.title: Personal Brand Website
projects.description: Full-stack Next.js site with animated signature, dynamic application funnels, and interactive resume system

projects.title: Creator Decoded
projects.description: Content creator analytics platform helping creators understand and grow their audience

projects.title: Fundamental Four Book
projects.description: Self-published book on four core pillars for personal and professional excellence: Innovate, Inspire, Invest, Impact
